heisig_chinese_memo: Everyone can agree that seeing a king with four mouths would be nothing short of shocking!
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Everyone can agree that seeing a king with four mouths would be nothing short of shocking!
humanum_full_description_en:
Bronze inscriptions are used as the name of the country, the classics are " E ", and Yu Ding: "Dun defeating Og, Xiu is only (acquired) Jue Jun controls Fang. It is also used as a person's name to hang on to the father's gui: "hang (uncle) to the father".

" Og " and "咢" are the same characters in ancient times, "Historical Records. "Chu Family": "Xiong", "Suoyin" said: "Mao is also bad", "Chronology of Twelve Princes" as " E ". "Er Ya. The "Classic Interpretation" of "Shi Le": "咢, this works as Hubei", so Rong Gengyun: "Blow is ugly, and breast milk is Hubei."

In later generations, " Og " is also used as " Stun ", which means panic, such as nightmares and bad news. "Jade Pian": "Og, surprise." (See Chinese Dictionary)
humanum_short_description_en: From the four " mouths " in the inscriptions, Wen Yiduo, Li Xiaoding, and Gaoming all thought of the same characters as " Og " and " mourning " in ancient times, to the beginning of the inscriptions with two characters respectively, with the word " mourning " plus "死" sound , And the word " Og " without the sound of " death ". See " mourning ".
humanum_full_description:
金文用作國名，典籍作「鄂」，禹鼎：「敦伐噩，休隻(獲)厥君馭方」。又用作人名，弔噩父簋：「弔(叔)噩父」。

　　「噩」、「咢」古同字，《史記．楚世家》：「熊咢」，《索隱》曰：「咢亦作噩」，《十二諸侯年表》作「鄂」。《爾雅．釋樂》的《經典釋文》：「咢，本作鄂」，故容庚云：「咢即噩，又孳乳為鄂也。」

　　後世「噩」又作「愕」，表示驚恐，如噩夢、噩耗，《玉篇》：「噩，驚也。」(參漢語大字典)
humanum_short_description: 金文從◎從四「口」，聞一多、李孝定、高明俱以為「噩」、「喪」古同字，至金文始分別為兩字，「喪」字加「亡」聲，而不加「亡」聲的是「噩」字。參見「喪」。

金文用作國名，典籍作「 鄂 」，禹鼎：「敦伐噩，休隻(獲)厥君馭方」。又用作人名，弔噩父簋：「弔(叔)噩父」。 「 噩 」、「 咢 」古同字，《史記．楚世家》：「熊咢」，《索隱》曰：「咢亦作噩」，《十二諸侯年表》作「 鄂 」。《爾雅．釋樂》的《經典釋文》：「咢，本作鄂」，故容庚云：「咢即噩，又孳乳為鄂也。」 後世「 噩 」又作「 愕 」，表示驚恐，如噩夢、噩耗，《玉篇》：「噩，驚也。」(參漢語大字典)
Bronze inscriptions are used as the name of the country, the classics are " E", and Yu Ding: "Dun defeating Og, Xiu is only (acquired) Jue Jun controls Fang. It is also used as a person's name to hang on to the father's gui: "hang (uncle) to the father". " Og" and " 咢" are the same characters in ancient times, "Historical Records. "Chu Family": "Xiong", "Suoyin" said: "Mao is also bad", "Chronology of Twelve Princes" as " E". "Er Ya. The "Classic Interpretation" of "Shi Le": "咢, this works as Hubei", so Rong Gengyun: "Blow is ugly, and breast milk is Hubei." In later generations, " Og" is also used as " Stun", which means panic, such as nightmares and bad news. "Jade Pian": "Og, surprise." (See Chinese Dictionary)

噩字的基本解释

噩
è
惊人的，不祥的：噩音（坏消息）。噩耗。噩梦。

噩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［è］
［《廣韻》五各切，入鐸，疑。］
(1)通“愕”。惊愕。参见“噩夢”。
(2)凶恶。参见“噩耗”。
(3)严正。
(4)淳朴。参见“噩噩”。
(5)肥腴貌。参见“噩噩”。
(6)用同“鱷”。

◎ 噩
shocking

噩字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　噩； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页210第04
【廣韻】五各切【集韻】魚各切【韻會】【正韻】逆各切，?音萼。【玉篇】驚也。【周禮·春官·占夢】六夢，二曰噩夢。【註】杜子春云：噩，當爲驚愕之愕，謂驚愕而夢。【釋文】噩，愕同。　又【韻會】嚴肅貌。【揚子·法言】周書噩噩爾。　又【爾雅·釋天】太歲在酉日作噩。【前漢·天文志】別作詻詻。【廣韻】亦作咢。【集韻】籀作?。通作鄂。

Цунмэн (цзи) и Цзунцянь (ни), открывшиеся как четыре рта (указывающие на шум), и Хуан Тунни (указывающие на недовольство и зловещие чувства) вместе выражают противоположное желанию, которое пугает всех.
Первоначальный смысл - паника.
